### getOffsetOf() {#ac892cf3d96fe5e728db657b6e02932f0}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>unsigned llvm::ARMBasicBlockUtils::getOffsetOf (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; MI) const</>}>
getOffsetOf - Return the current offset of the specified machine instruction from the start of the function.

This offset changes as stuff is moved around inside the function.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armbasicblockinfo-h/#l00132">132</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armbasicblockinfo-h">ARMBasicBlockInfo.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armbasicblockinfo-cpp/#l00072">72</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armbasicblockinfo-cpp">ARMBasicBlockInfo.cpp</a>.
